<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/loose.dtd"> <html>
<head> <title>[% $$NODE{title}; %]@Everything2.com</title> [% # CSSURL could be a user setting, eh? That could be pretty darn cool. %] <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" [% %]href="[% return "/ekwcss.pl"; return $$VARS{ 'ekw_CSSURL' } || "/ekwcss/".CGI::escape($$USER{title}).".css"; %]" /> <link rel='stylesheet' id='basesheet' type='text/css' href='/node/stylesheet/basesheet?displaytype=view'> <meta name="wisdom" content="Monkey! Bat! Robot Hat!" /> <link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" /><!-- Both are needed - asc --> <link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" /><!-- Thanks Simpleton --> <link rel="alternate" type="application/atom+xml" title="Everything2 New Writeups" href="?node=New%20Writeups%20Atom%20Feed&type=ticker" /> [{static javascript}] </head>
